job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: SummaryLocation: Pasadena CA and Austin TXAs Site Reliability Engineer you will be responsible for ensuring the scalability, availability, and security of a large-scale, globally distributed hybrid cloud infrastructure.RequirementsBS in Computer Science or equivalent experienceStrong knowledge of Linux/Unix System internalsExperience in troubleshooting and performance tuning of large-scale systemsSystem automation experienceA thorough understanding of how the internet worksExperience in operating, troubleshooting and scaling production systemsWriting code is strongly emphasizedExperience in web application stacks, proxies, load balancers and firewallsAWS experience is a plusBenefitsCompetitive salary and bonus program in an entrepreneurial environmentTop-notch health, dental, and vision insurance401k plan with matching contributionProfessional TrainingGenerous paid time off plan plus paid holidaysFrequent company sponsored lunches, happy hours, fun events, and plenty of snacks and drinksCasual work environmentSupplyframe is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, protected Veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.
